name: Estrela
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
textInChatBox: Happy womans day!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: On this day I want to show all your strengths, your values and your dedication to reach your goals, your sense of justice and your unconditional love, I know that I am not the best friend you have ever had and I ask your forgiveness for that, but I will always improve to give you everything you deserve.
replayText: I love you dummy, click HERE if you want to see it again
